page.title: 06COMMUNITY COUNCIL: SHAWHEAD
page.content:
The Community Council holds a meeting in the school on the third Tuesday of every month. It organises a sports week with games like bowls, football, badminton, snooker and pool.
It also organises the local craft and produce show which has several sections such as gardening, food and one for children. There are small money prizes for each of the sections. If you get more 1st, 2nd and 3rd prizes than anyone else you get your name on a shield.
The Community Council helps with local problems. For instance it asked for extra road signs to make the junction between the A75 and the Shawhead road safer.
